text: <@U6788D83U> I think I have an idea for the mistake. In “High Order Methods for the Numerical Solution of Two-Point Boundary Value Problems.” _BIT Numerical Mathematics_ 22, no. 2 (June 1, 1982): 183–99. <https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01944476>., the Butcher tableau on p190 is not lower matrix, how can it implement (3.11) ?
